title: Why does destroying the Nexus grant gold?
body:
That's the end of the game, ... it's not like you're going to get to spend it. All it does is pad your post game stats a little bit. 

It doesn't make any difference really, just ... why?

replies.body: cuz sometimes you really need that extra 50 gold
I gives you a whole health pot so obviously its very valuable.
its so riot can make the loading screen joke saying "if you need an extra 50 gold, try killing the nexus!"
